content.body: how come `new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'unit', unit: 'byte', unitDisplay: 'narrow', notation: 'compact' }).format(1234567891)` prints out `1.2BB` and not `1.2GB`?
content.formatted_body: how come new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'unit', unit: 'byte', unitDisplay: 'narrow', notation: 'compact' }).format(1234567891) prints out 1.2BB and not 1.2GB?

content.body: because you said you wanted bytes
